name: generate_qr_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool qrx1.
Tool description: Generate one time use QR-codes.
API description: ## Generates a QR code that can only be used once.

 - If the QR code is not used within 3minutes it will be invalidated.
 - Timeout can be altered with the timeout parameter (maximum lifetime is 60minutes).
 - Fully customizable

data.description: The data to be encoded into the QR code.
